segments.text: Professor , could I make an appointment with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am free tomorrow afternoon between two and four ; do you have a particular time in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Two o'clock would be the best time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , do you know where my office is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Remember , it is in the E building on the third floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry , it will work out fine once you get there . I'll see you then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Looking forward to meeting with you !
segments.speaker: S2
